mapper.select: select split_part(tablename,'_',1) name from pg_tables where schemaname = 'public' and position('_' in tablename)>0 group by split_part(tablename,'_',1) order by split_part(tablename,'_',1)
select tablename name from pg_tables where tablename like #{tb} ||'!_%' ESCAPE '!' and schemaname = 'public' and tablename not like '%prt%' order by tablename
select attname name from pg_attribute as a INNER JOIN pg_class AS c ON a.attrelid = c.oid INNER JOIN pg_tables AS T ON c.relname = T.TABLENAME where T.TABLENAME=#{tb} and attstattarget=-1
